About Me

I am studying at Esa Unggul University majoring in Information Systems. This semester I am taking the MSIB Independent study program on the LearningX Essential Programing Course!

I am the first child of 3 siblings, now I am 20 years old and I live in Bekasi City

Achievement

My school futsal team and I won the Futsal Pocari sweat Championship which was held in the West Java region and I was able to qualify for the National Phase.
